content.raw: Thanks for bringing my attention to this section of code. This section is running a parameterized test (all physics engines) and trying to test a change that will only be affected in ODE (since the other physics engines don't have `contact_max_correcting_vel` as a parameter). It looks like this part of the test is redundant with the section above it. I'm not really sure what to do though, so I'm just going to add a conditional to only expect the `SetParam` to return true if the physics engine is ODE. ~~Test should pass in 5f8988c.~~ just kidding, I need to change the `contact_sensor` test too. The `SetParam` calls there for physics engine parameters have a similar lack of effect on the test.
content.html: Thanks for bringing my attention to this section of code. This section is running a parameterized test (all physics engines) and trying to test a change that will only be affected in ODE (since the other physics engines don't have contact_max_correcting_vel as a parameter). It looks like this part of the test is redundant with the section above it. I'm not really sure what to do though, so I'm just going to add a conditional to only expect the SetParam to return true if the physics engine is ODE. Test should pass in 5f8988c. just kidding, I need to change the contact_sensor test too. The SetParam calls there for physics engine parameters have a similar lack of effect on the test.
